charityWorker.description: The IWGB is calling for justice and equality for all workers in the charity sector!
charityWorker.name: Charity worker

cleanerFacilities.description: The IWGB represents cleaners, porters, hospitality workers and domestic workers across London.
cleanerFacilities.name: Cleaner or facilities worker

courier.description: Couriers, riders and delivery workers are organising for rights, respect and fair pay.
courier.name: Courier or logistics worker

cycleInstructor.description: Cycle instructors across Britain are organising against precarity and low pay!
cycleInstructor.name: Cycle instructor

fosterCarer.description: The Foster Care Workers Branch of the IWGB is calling for reforms to the fostering system in the UK.
fosterCarer.name: Foster carer

gameWorker.description: The IWGB Game Workers Branch is  a trade union organising for game workers' rights.
gameWorker.name: Game worker

higherEducation.description: If you work at a university in London, please sign up here!
higherEducation.name: Higher education worker

privateHireDriver.description: The United Private Hire Drivers are fighting for workers' rights for drivers across Britain.
privateHireDriver.name: Private hire driver

securityReceptionist.description: The IWGB represents security guards and receptionists across London to win respect and decent pay.
securityReceptionist.name: Security guard or receptionist

yogaTeacher.description: Yoga teachers are organising for rights, equity and fair pay.
yogaTeacher.name: Yoga teacher

nanny.name: Resources and support for nannies and au pairs across the UK.

jobType.costs.text: We'll let you know which fee applies to you before you set up your payment.
jobType.error.aid: If you continue to have issues, feel free to get in contact with us. We might ask for your applicant ID:
jobType.error.body: Sorry, but due to an error, we've had to quit your application as we couldn't find your session. For your security, you must have cookies enabled to sign up to the IWGB.
jobType.error.title: We couldn't find your session
jobType.heading: Tell us about your work
jobType.help.text: Drop the memberships team a line using the contact form to find out if you can join the IWGB.
jobType.other.description: If you want to organise with us but can’t see your sector here, then you can join the IWGB’s General Members Branch.
jobType.other.name: Other
jobType.title: Join us
jobType.yoga-teacher.description: Yoga teachers are organising for rights, equity and fair pay.
jobType.yoga-teacher.name: Yoga teacher
jobType.nanny.name: Nanny or au pair
jobType.nanny.description: Resources and support for nannies and au pairs across the UK.

contact.title: None of those sound right?
contact.body: Drop the memberships team a line using the contact form to find out if you can join the IWGB.

fees.title: Our membership fees
fees.body: We'll let you know which fee applies to you before you set up your payment.

weAre.body: We’re a new and dynamic independent trade union. From our roots representing migrant workers, we’ve evolved to taking on the bosses of the so-called gig economy and government regulators, representing under-unionised and under-represented workforces.

0.title: Organise for change
0.body: Join the IWGB and campaign for long-lasting change in your workplace. The union creates real collective power among workers.

1.title: Workplace protection
1.body: From workplace bullying to illegal deduction of wages, if you are facing problems at work, then contact your union.

2.title: Support us
2.body: Your donations will help the union run campaigns and make sure we can support every member.

contact.title: Get in touch
contact.body: Our offices are now closed due to the Covid-19 pandemic.

form.text: The best way to get in touch with us is to {link}.

phone.openingHours: We normally answer the phone 9am-5pm on working days

address.value:
St Margaret's House,
15 Old Ford Road,
Bethnal Green,
London,
E2 9PJ

footer.copyright: {copy} Independent Workers Union of Great Britain {year}
footer.credit: Designed and built at the IWGB with love, care and coffee. Hasta la victoria siempre.

donate.title: Our work matters
donate.body: We're just one David and there's a lot of Goliaths out there. As such, we rely on dues and donations to do our work - if you can, we'd really appreciate any contributions to our vital work.
